title: Shattered Love's Artwork
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:eventyr]]

[[=]]
+ **In Those I Seek, In None I Find**
[[/=]]
[[include component:image-block
|name=SL.png
|caption=**Shattered Love's Fanart_In Those I Seek, In None I Find**
|width=80%
|align=center]]

[[=]]
[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/shattered-love âœ¦ Find the source of the Astronomical Phenomena?]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[div class="evenflowery"]]
In every universe, there you are and here I am.

Will two separate entities have a way to collide? And if they have, will it create the end of the universe or the birth of a new phenomenon?

There is no way to find out. The more you want to find it, the faster it will crumble to dust.

Better leave the future untouched, don't you think?

[[/div]]
[[/=]]

[[div class="eventyr-hr-short"]]
[[/div]]

> [[size larger]]**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:a-shining-moon-s-observatory Enter the Observatory?]**[[/size]]
